sentences.sCn: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”
“你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.sContent: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.sCn: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.sContent: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.sCn: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.sContent: Sixty percent of people voted no.
If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.sCn: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

trans.tranOther: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request
used on signs to say that something is not allowed
